solution_line_template: The total cost of the entrees is {num_entrees} * ${entree_cost} = $<<{num_entrees}*{entree_cost}={total_entree_cost}>>{total_entree_cost}.
The total cost of the dinner is ${total_entree_cost} + ${appetizer_cost} = $<<{total_entree_cost}+{appetizer_cost}={dinner_total}>>{dinner_total}.
The total cost with tip is ${dinner_total} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{dinner_total}+{tip_amount}={total_with_tip}>>{total_with_tip}
